snippet: The University of Nebraska’s defense took another major hit as Coach Bo Pelini announced that middle linebacker Michael Rose would have knee surgery next week and miss the season.
lead_paragraph: The University of Nebraska’s defense took another major hit as Coach Bo Pelini announced that middle linebacker Michael Rose would have knee surgery next week and miss the season.

headline.main: Another Nebraska Defender Will Miss Season
headline.print_headline: Another Nebraska Defender Will Miss Season
